extendedInfo.description: Note: The app is for tablets only, not for smartphones.Get Grandma on Facebook in less than 30 minutes â itâs quick, easy and safe! Introduce a senior â your older parent or grandparent â to Facebook with EasyFamily SocialÂ®: the first app for Facebook designed with beginners and seniors in mind!Facebook just became so easy and completely safe for beginners and seniors:â Simple, clean interface: no clutter to confuse and distract beginners and seniors â Easy viewing of pictures: one touch, simple access to ALL family and friendsâ Facebook photo albums â Easy filtering of posts and pictures with âFamilyâ and âFriendsâ tabsSafe Mode ensures the safest introduction to Facebook for beginners and seniors:â Provides fool-proof browsing to help beginners avoid early mistakes â Blocks text entry so that beginners can browse freely and safely and âLikeâ posts and picture albums without commentingâ Is easily activated by flipping a switch on the profile tab.With EasyFamily SocialÂ®, even a beginner like Grandma can master Facebook in just a few minutes!This simple and safe app is available for Android, iPad, Windows or Mac.Are you interested in easy Skype, easy email, easy Medication Reminders and other great family applications for seniors? Then please visit www.EasyFamilyApps.com for these great free apps!

reviews.title: Really good!!! Great for my mom
reviews.comment: I installed this for my mom. She likes it better than the original Facebook App. Its very easy to navigate.
reviews.author: Danielle Pawul

reviews.title: This is great for my mom!
reviews.comment: I installed this on my mom\'s phone today and it\'s pretty cool.  I recommend this to any one who is new to facebook! Easy to use and understand Thanks for a Great app now my mom can see updates of our son and his growth any where cause she can use facebook now!!
reviews.author: Marie Baker

reviews.title: Facebook for parents
reviews.comment: I used this app on my parents tablet and android. And as a result they are already in love with the application. I gave it a try as well. I found out its easy to use. Just login in with your facebook and get going. It has given users a different view on facebook. Thanks for creating such a nice app.
reviews.author: yonesh thapa

reviews.title: Solid, approachable app
reviews.comment: This app is simple enough for my grandparents to use but comprehensive enough to let them do as much on facebook as I do! 5/5
reviews.author: Max Boynton

reviews.title: Great for my Home Tab
reviews.comment: I really find a great apps which gave me a best way to use the Facebook apps in Android. I am waiting for the next version of this apps.Thank you
reviews.author: Mrutunjay Chell

reviews.title: Makes Facebook \'Tablet Friendly\'
reviews.comment: Regarding today\'s technology, I try to keep up but I couldn\'t use Facebook on my tablet like on my computer. This app makes it easy & fun.
reviews.author: Dizee Dee

reviews.title: Nice Apps
reviews.comment: Hai This one is the best apps to use the Facebook in your tab. Now this makes me very smarter way to use. The main thing i likes most is the searching and chatting process.
reviews.author: Priya Cool

reviews.title: Won\'t work
reviews.comment: Loaded on the different phones. 2 HTC and samsung. Only horizontal page loading, next page stuck and never went further on any phone. Great idea wish it would work since an app for seniors is desperately needed. I\'ll try again if problems are resolved.
reviews.author: Elaine Eames

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Not fit on my Samsung s3
reviews.author: watsup hayy

reviews.title: Suer
reviews.comment: Better
reviews.author: Sanoop Kv

reviews.title: Efficient
reviews.comment: And accessible for my grandparents works like a charm. My parents on the other hand are too addicted to it already. But it is worth it. I highly recommend it to the older generation.
reviews.author: Jimmy Lorevil

reviews.comment: This app is a useful tool for learning about Facebook.
reviews.author: molly ulum

reviews.title: Great app for Mom!
reviews.comment: It was very easy to start using for Mom. Thanks!
reviews.author: Lester Williams

reviews.title: Feel Good
reviews.comment: It is nice to see this apps I was looking for this kind of apps and finally got it its screen is good and very user friendly so i like it.
reviews.author: Jai Kumar

reviews.title: Really good app
reviews.comment: I installed the app today for my mom. The app is great for her because she is new to Facebook. The app actually help my mom learn more about the use of Facebook. I would recommend the app to others.
reviews.author: Mimi Frazer

reviews.title: Android Tablet
reviews.comment: I downloaded this for my dad and he loves it. He does not know how to do anything with technology but he can get on Facebook now. Thank God for this app!
reviews.author: Selena Marie

reviews.title: Great app for adults
reviews.comment: This app is really good. I downloaded this app for my dad since he is 50 and wanted to fb. Its very easy to use!
reviews.author: Dev Patel

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: I helped my grandma get this app loaded onto her new tablet and it is so easy to use. Now grandma can easily stay in touch. The app is so user friendly!
reviews.author: Amanda Smith

reviews.title: Mom and Dad Love it!!!
reviews.comment: Absolutely love it! I installed this on my parents tablet and phones and they are absolutely in love. They feel connected to the family now. They were able to updates and pictures of their new grandson. Great app, thank you for creating it.
reviews.author: Roberto Castaneda

reviews.title: This is a really great app!!!!!
reviews.comment: I really love this app, it is better that any other app in its category. What I love the most about it is how easy it is to use and the friendly interface. I have to hand it to the developers, you really hit the spot with this app. Thanks!!!!!
reviews.author: Selwyn Paul
